root.name: Audiosurf 2
root.description: BetaOriginally there were beta sign-ups for Audiosurf 2 (formerly Audiosurf: Air) in early 2012, but no new information was made available for over a year. In August 2013, it was announced that Audiosurf 2 would be an Early Access game on Steam sometime in September, although it was finally released for purchase on October 2nd, 2013.While Audiosurf 2 maintains the same gameplay ideology of the first in selecting your own music and customizing a level to create an immersive experience, it features new modes of gameplay such as a wakeboarding mode, and also supports the Steam Workshop.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Hard Drive: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Runs well on even older systems with minimal settings
